Lyric:
[00:09.240]What would I do without your smart mouth?
[00:13.160]Drawing me in, and you kicking me out
[00:17.100]You've got my head spinning, no kidding, I can't pin you down
[00:24.920]What's going on in that beautiful mind
[00:28.750]I'm on your magical mystery ride
[00:32.660]And I'm so dizzy, don't know what hit me, but I'll be alright
[00:41.320]My head's under water
[00:44.890]But I'm breathing fine
[00:49.190]You're crazy and I'm out of my mind
[00:57.200]'Cause all of me
[00:59.960]Loves all of you
[01:03.880]Love your curves and all your edges
[01:07.720]All your perfect imperfections
[01:11.650]Give your all to me
[01:15.290]I'll give my all to you
[01:19.740]You're my end and my beginning
[01:23.400]Even when I lose I'm winning
[01:27.040]'Cause I give you all of me
[01:34.930]And you give me all of you, oh
[01:45.140]How many times do I have to tell you
[01:49.080]Even when you're crying you're beautiful too
[01:52.800]The world is beating you down, I'm around through every mood
[02:00.740]You're my downfall, you're my muse
[02:04.390]My worst distraction, my rhythm and blues
[02:08.330]I can't stop singing, it's ringing, in my head for you
[02:17.270]My head's under water
[02:21.060]But I'm breathing fine
[02:25.240]You're crazy and I'm out of my mind
[02:30.720]'Cause all of me
[02:33.950]Loves all of you
[02:37.690]Love your curves and all your edges
[02:41.700]All your perfect imperfections
[02:45.520]Give your all to me
[02:49.240]I'll give my all to you
[02:53.520]You're my end and my beginning
[02:57.330]Even when I lose I'm winning
[03:00.980]'Cause I give you all of me
[03:08.890]And you give me all of you, oh
[03:17.250]I give you all of me
[03:17.490]Give me all of you
[03:24.830]And you give me all of you, oh
